abstract: Nate Chinen reviews memorial concert at B B King Blues Club for musician Jeff Golub, who died in beginning of January at age 59.
lead_paragraph: A roster of collaborators honored the guitarist Jeff Golub, who died Jan. 1 at 59, in a heartfelt musical tribute at the B. B. King Blues Club.
snippet: A roster of collaborators honored the guitarist Jeff Golub, who died Jan. 1 at 59, in a heartfelt musical tribute at the B. B. King Blues Club.

keywords.value: B B King Blues Club and Grill (Manhattan, NY)

headline.main: Shimmering Memories of a Mellow Collaborator
